>Subject: Gay tales of the Samurai ?

> 
>Help I'm confused ! I thought this was Japan, not ancient Greece !!
>  
>
See the movie Gohatto... I just thought it was another chanbara. Luckily 
I borrowed it from the library and did not buy it.

> Thanks, I've taken a look, this one seems to be a 1.33:1 screen format, 
>I've also seen one being advertised 2.35:1 is that right...or has some got 
>things a little awry?  
>
No, one is a wide screen version and the other is normal, another way to 
express it is 4:3 (normal) 16:9 (wide). (I work with too much video!) 
Wide screen was uncommon until the 50's, most older films were shot in 
the 4:3 ratio. (former film major also)

Jim Eckman
